Title: 10 minute shake 1
Description: When there's a crash on the track, Red the fire truck is there in a flash to help. Can you battle the flames and stop the fire spreading?

Steps.Description: Choose one person to pretend to be Red the fire truck, and the other to be the fire.

The person who is fire now throws all the sheets of paper into the air â€“ when the last one lands on the ground, start the Disney timer. Fire must turn as many sheets over to read FIRE, while Red turns them over to read WATER.
